'''Glinting Component''' is a [[Quest Item]] found after defeating certain [[Primal Construct]]s in underground ruins of the [[Great Red Sand]].

A total of 5 can be found and are required to open the locked door west of [[The Mausoleum of King Deshret]] during the [[Hidden Exploration Objective]] [[The Dead End and the Glinting Architects]].
